definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: A study is made on Cauchy problem of compressible Eulers equations with relaxation term.
sentences.chinese: 研究具鬆弛項可壓縮的歐拉方程組柯西問題。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the proof and application of Cauchy mean-value theorem from many angles.
sentences.chinese: 本文多角度介紹了柯西中值定理的證明方法和應用。

sentences.english: The theoretical distribution is log-Cauchy distribution.
sentences.chinese: 該表達式爲對數柯西分佈。

sentences.english: A discussion on some characterized mapping conclusions similar to Cauchy integral theorem.
sentences.chinese: 討論具有某種特徵映射的類似柯西積分定理的結論。

sentences.english: An Asymptotic Property for the Median Point of Cauchy Mean-value Theorem;
sentences.chinese: 本文多角度介紹了柯西中值定理的證明方法和應用。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the proof and application of Cauchy mean-value theorem from many angles in every aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了柯西中值定理的多種證明方法及其應用。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present the proofs of Lagrange Theory and Cauchy Theory. By this method we may determine coefficient.
sentences.chinese: 本文用待定係數法證明拉格朗日定理與柯西定理。

sentences.english: Kosygin gave the impression of doing so on the basis of skillful calculation .
sentences.chinese: 柯西金這樣做時給人的印象是經過巧妙算計的。

sentences.english: Construct a determinant function to popularize Cauchy theorem of mean.
sentences.chinese: 構造一行列式函數將柯西中值定理推廣。

sentences.english: From the trees, Cosimo explained, he could see the earth more clearly.
sentences.chinese: 柯西莫說，在樹上他可以將地面上的事情看得更清楚。

sentences.english: The second section discusses the biography of Cauchy and his work.
sentences.chinese: 第二段則探討柯西的生平及其工作。

definition: Lagrange (name)/Joseph-Louis Lagrange (1735-1813), French mathematician and physicist
variant of 費瑪|费玛[Fei4 ma3]
Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
Cantor (name)/Georg Cantor (1845-1918), German mathematician, founder of set theory 集合論|集合论[ji2 he2 lun4]
Évariste Galois (1811-1832), famous French mathematical prodigy and unsuccessful duelist/also written 伽羅瓦|伽罗瓦

pinyin: Wei2 er3 si1 te4 la1 si1

definition: Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher
Évariste Galois (1811-1832), famous French mathematical prodigy and unsuccessful duelist
